fields.description:
We have a TabGroup that requires a Window component:

{code}
<Alloy>
	<TabGroup id="tg" navBarHidden="true">
		<Tab id="mainTab" title="Main" icon="/images/icon-main.png" >
			<Require id="mainView" src="MainView"></Require>
		</Tab>
{code}

MainView is defined is a `Window` with `navBarHidden`

{code}
<Alloy>
	<Window class="container" navBarHidden="true">
{code}

On particular action the `mainTab` from `TabGroup` opens a new window with a navBar (`navBarHidden="false")

During transition a visual glitch occur (bti difficult to capture on static screenshot but I hope it gives an idea where it occurs)
fields.summary: iOS Visual glitch during animation between Windows with navBar and without navBar
